value.title: Tempus
value.excerpt: Tempus is a technology company that is building the world‚Äôs largest library of molecular and clinical data and an operating system to make that data accessible and useful, in an effort to bring the power of artificial intelligence to healthcare. value.excerpt: Affectiva, an MIT Media Lab spin-off, is the pioneer in Emotion AI, the next frontier of artificial intelligence.
